effect.zh: 當受到攻擊效果絕佳時，將有50%機率在接下來5回合結束時，對敵人追加一次該傷害
effect.en: 50% chance of dealing 1 additional attack at the end of the next 5 rounds when received an attack that is super effective

effect.zh: 當某一項能力降低時，有50%幾率會使另外一項能力提高1級
effect.en: If one stat is lowered, there is a 50% chance to raise another stat by one level.

effect.zh: 天氣處於大雨天時，將有50%機率使水系威力招式提高30%，持續3回合
effect.en: When the weather is heavy rain, there will be 50% chance of increasing water-type moves by 30% for 3 rounds

effect.zh: 天氣處於大日照時，將有50%幾率使火威力招式提高30%，持續3回合
effect.en: When the weather is extremely harsh sunlight, there will be 50% chance of increasing fire-type moves by 30% for 3 rounds.

effect.zh: 對於血量低於一半值的精靈，50%機率所有主動傷害技能提高10%
effect.en: For Pokémon with less than half their HP, there is a 50% chance to increase the damage of all active damaging skills by 10%.

effect.zh: 相同屬性時，對目標造成攻擊，並有50%機率使自身獲得光牆狀態
effect.en: When attacking a target with the same attribute, there is a 50% chance to grant itself the Light Screen status.

effect.zh: 陷入異常狀態時，有50%機率在使用招式回合在內的接下來3回合中，每回合寶可夢自身的防禦或特防能力值+1
effect.en: When afflicted with a status condition, there is a 50% chance to increase Defense or Special Defense by 1 level for the next 3 turns, including the turn used to execute a move.

effect.zh: 受到物理招式攻擊後發動，有50%幾率使對手損傷最大HP的1/3
effect.en: 50% chance of inflicting 1/3 of the foe's maximu maximum HP when received P. ATK moves.

effect.zh: 受到異常狀態時，有50%機率速度加倍。持續時間為4回合，包括使用的當回合
effect.en: When under a status condition, there is a 50% chance to double speed for 4 turns, including the turn used to execute a move.

effect.zh: 當被擊落或者異常狀態時，將有50%幾率提升1級攻擊和特攻
effect.en: When knocked out or under a status condition, there is a 50% chance to increase Attack and Special Attack by 1 level.

effect.zh: 當被擊落或者異常狀態時，將有50%機率提升1級防禦和特防
effect.en: When knocked out or under a status condition, there is a 50% chance to increase Defense and Special Defense by 1 level.

effect.zh: 被攻擊時，目標30%幾率被植入寄生種子
effect.en: When attacked, there is a 30% chance to inflict the target with Leech Seed.

effect.zh: 使用火屬性攻擊招式時，有30%幾率令目標灼燒
effect.en: When using a Fire-type attack, there is a 30% chance to inflict the target with a burn.

effect.zh: 在下雨天氣每回合結束時，有30%提高1級攻擊或特攻
effect.en: At the end of each round in rainy weather, there is a 30% chance to increase Attack or Special Attack by 1 level.

effect.zh: 目標替換寶可夢時，有30%機率目標在接下來的回合內無法做出包括使出招式、使用道具、逃走替換寶可夢的任何指令
effect.en: When a teammate switches out, there is a 30% chance that the target cannot perform any actions, including using moves, items, or switching, for the next round.

effect.zh: 受到火屬性招式攻擊時，有30%的機率使目標陷入混亂狀態
effect.en: When hit by a Fire-type move, there is a 30% chance to confuse the target.

effect.zh: 受到水屬性招式攻擊時，有30%的機率使目標陷入燒傷狀態
effect.en: When hit by a Water-type move, there is a 30% chance to burn the target.

effect.zh: 受到克制屬性招式攻擊時，有30%的機率使自身速度提升1級
effect.en: When hit by a move with a type disadvantage, there is a 30% chance to increase its speed by 1 level.

effect.zh: 當某一能力提升至2級時，有30%的幾率使使該能力+1
effect.en: When a stat is raised to level 2, there is a 30% chance to increase that stat by 1 level.

effect.zh: 每回合受到傷害時，有30%的機率恢復損失生命值的一半
effect.en: Each time it takes damage, there is a 30% chance to recover half of the lost HP.

effect.zh: 上場時，出場陣容中有一個瀕死的精靈，有50%機率提高自身2級防禦與特防
effect.en: Upon entering battle, if there is a fainted Pokémon on the team, there is a 50% chance to increase its Defense and Special Defense by 2 levels.

effect.zh: 如果自身上一回合的招式使用失敗，沒有命中目標或者對目標沒有效果，則本回合有30%機率觸發威力加倍(守住等技能阻擋不會觸發)
effect.en: If the previous turn's move fails to hit the target, there is a 30% chance to double the power of the next move (excluding moves blocked by abilities like Protect).

effect.zh: 當提高自身攻擊等級時，將有50%機率在接下來的5回合內免疫異常狀態
effect.en: When its Attack is raised, there is a 50% chance to be immune to status conditions for the next 5 rounds.

effect.zh: 當本次攻擊將對手擊退時(瀕死或退場)，在下一回合發動攻擊招式時，有50%機率使本次招式威力提升30%
effect.en: When knocking out an opponent or forcing them to switch out, there is a 50% chance to increase the power of the next move by 30%.

effect.zh: 主動使用效果拔群的招式時，有30%提升招式10點命中
effect.en: When hit by a critical hit or a move with a high critical-hit ratio, there is a 30% chance to increase the power of its next move by 5%.

effect.zh: 被擊中要害或者效果拔群的招式擊中時，下一回合有30%機率攻擊招式的威力提升5%
effect.en: When hit by a move with a high accuracy, there is a 30% chance to increase the accuracy of its next move by 10%.

effect.zh: 受到克制屬性招式攻擊時，有30%的機率與對手共同承受相同的攻擊傷害值
effect.en: When hit by a super-effective Steel-type move, there is a 30% chance to reduce the damage of that move by half.

effect.zh: 每次獲得異常狀態時，有20%機率提高1級特攻
effect.en: When an opponent becomes affected by a status condition, there is a 20% chance to increase its Special Attack by 1 level.

effect.zh: 當特攻或特防能力提升至2級時，有30%機率在接下來3個回合內不會受到攻擊以外(異常狀態變化)的傷害
effect.en: When its Special Attack or Special Defense is raised to level 2, there is a 30% chance to be immune to damage other than status condition changes for the next 3 rounds.

effect.zh: 受到攻擊傷害時，有30%機率恢復自身血量1/10
effect.en: When taking damage, there is a 30% chance to recover 1/10 of its HP.

effect.zh: 被攻擊時，30%機率提高1級特防
effect.en: When attacked, there is a 30% chance to increase its Special Defense by 1 level.

effect.zh: HP低於最大HP1/4時，有30%機率提高1級攻擊或特防
effect.en: When its HP falls below 1/4 of its maximum, there is a 30% chance to increase its Attack or Special Defense by 1 level.

effect.zh: 受到效果絕佳的鋼屬性招式攻擊，30%幾率減半該招式的傷害
effect.en: When hit by a super-effective Steel-type move, there is a 30% chance to reduce the damage of that move by half.

effect.zh: 當對手陷入異常狀態，使用威力低於50的攻擊招式有20%幾率使本次招式威力提升50%
effect.en: When the opponent becomes affected by a status condition, there is a 20% chance to increase the power of its next move by 50%.

effect.zh: 陷入混亂狀態時，30%幾率在發動招式解除混亂狀態
effect.en: When confused, there is a 30% chance to cure itself of confusion when using a move.
